title: XDA Forums are now open for the Realme GT 2 series, Moto Edge Plus, and POCO X4 Pro
content:
Several Android OEMs showcased their latest devices over the last couple of days. Realme announced its highly-anticipated Realme GT 2 and Realme GT 2 Pro, Xiaomi’s sub-brand POCO launched its mid-range POCO X4 Pro, and Motorola debuted its flagship Moto Edge Plus 2022. As the title suggests, we’ve now opened up XDA forums for all

The post XDA Forums are now open for the Realme GT 2 series, Moto Edge Plus, and POCO X4 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: We've opened up XDA forums for the recently launched Realme GT 2, Realme GT 2 Pro, Motorola Edge Plus, and POCO X4 Pro.
